sense.gloss: to discuss, to talk about, to deal with (a topic)
to take into consideration, to make an issue of

sdata.j: ↑実地↑↓じっち↓は↑理論↑↓りろん↓と↑同様↑↓どうよう↓に↑大切↑↓たいせつ↓であるが、われわれは↑理論↑↓りろん↓を↑重↑↓おも↓んじ、↑実地↑↓じっち↓を↑軽↑↓か|ろ↓んずる|↑傾向↑↓けいこう↓がある。
sdata.e: Practice is as important as theory, but we are apt to value the latter and despise the former.

sdata.j: ↑小事↑↓しょうじ↓を↑軽↑↓か|ろ↓んずる|なかれ。
sdata.e: Take care of the pence and the pounds will take care of themselves.
